abbr.descriptionText: Alternative label to use for the header cell when referencing the cell in other contexts

accept.descriptionText: Hint for expected file type in file upload controls
accept.type: Set of comma-separated tokens* consisting of valid MIME type strings with no parameters or audio/*, video/*, or image/*

accept-charset.descriptionText: Character encodings to use for form submission

accesskey.descriptionText: Keyboard shortcut to activate or focus element
accesskey.type: Ordered set of unique space-separated tokens, none of which are identical to another, each consisting of one code point in length

action.descriptionText: URL to use for form submission
action.type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

allow.descriptionText: Permissions policy to be applied to the iframe's contents

allowfullscreen.descriptionText: Whether to allow the iframe's contents to use requestFullscreen()

alt.descriptionText: Replacement text for use when images are not available

as.descriptionText: Potential destination for a preload request (for rel="preload" and rel="modulepreload")
as.type: Potential destination, for rel="preload"; script-like destination, for rel="modulepreload"

async.descriptionText: Execute script when available, without blocking while fetching

autocapitalize.descriptionText: Recommended autocapitalization behavior (for supported input methods)

autocomplete.descriptionText: Default setting for autofill feature for controls in the form

autocomplete.type: Autofill field name and related tokens*

autofocus.descriptionText: Automatically focus the element when the page is loaded

autoplay.descriptionText: Hint that the media resource can be started automatically when the page is loaded

blocking.descriptionText: Whether the element is potentially render-blocking
blocking.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens*

cite.descriptionText: Link to the source of the quotation or more information about the edit
cite.type: Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces

class.descriptionText: Classes to which the element belongs

color.descriptionText: Color to use when customizing a site's icon (for rel="mask-icon")

cols.descriptionText: Maximum number of characters per line
cols.type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

colspan.descriptionText: Number of columns that the cell is to span
colspan.type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

coords.descriptionText: Coordinates for the shape to be created in an image map

crossorigin.descriptionText: How the element handles crossorigin requests

data.type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

datetime.descriptionText: Date and (optionally) time of the change
datetime.type: Valid date string with optional time

Valid month string,
          valid date string,
          valid yearless date string,
          valid time string,
          valid local date and time string,
          valid time-zone offset string,
          valid global date and time string,
          valid week string,
          valid non-negative integer, or
          valid duration string

decoding.descriptionText: Decoding hint to use when processing this image for presentation

default.descriptionText: Enable the track if no other text track is more suitable

dir.descriptionText: The text directionality of the element
The text directionality of the element

dirname.descriptionText: Name of form control to use for sending the element's directionality in form submission

disabled.descriptionText: Whether the form control is disabled
Whether the descendant form controls, except any inside legend, are disabled

download.descriptionText: Whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its filename if so

enctype.descriptionText: Entry list encoding type to use for form submission

enterkeyhint.descriptionText: Hint for selecting an enter key action

fetchpriority.descriptionText: Sets the priority for fetches initiated by the element

for.descriptionText: Associate the label with form control
Specifies controls from which the output was calculated
for.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens consisting of IDs*

form.descriptionText: Associates the element with a form element

formaction.descriptionText: URL to use for form submission
formaction.type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

formenctype.descriptionText: Entry list encoding type to use for form submission

formmethod.descriptionText: Variant to use for form submission

formnovalidate.descriptionText: Bypass form control validation for form submission

formtarget.type: Valid navigable target name or keyword

headers.descriptionText: The header cells for this cell
headers.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens consisting of IDs*

href.type: Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces
Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces
Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces

imagesizes.descriptionText: Image sizes for different page layouts (for rel="preload")

imagesrcset.descriptionText: Images to use in different situations, e.g., high-resolution displays, small monitors, etc. (for rel="preload")
imagesrcset.type: Comma-separated list of image candidate strings

inputmode.descriptionText: Hint for selecting an input modality

integrity.descriptionText: Integrity metadata used in Subresource Integrity checks [SRI]

is.type: Valid custom element name of a defined customized built-in element

ismap.descriptionText: Whether the image is a server-side image map

itemid.descriptionText: Global identifier for a microdata item
itemid.type: Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces

itemprop.descriptionText: Property names of a microdata item
itemprop.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens consisting of valid absolute URLs, defined property names, or text*

itemref.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens consisting of IDs*

itemtype.descriptionText: Item types of a microdata item
itemtype.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens consisting of valid absolute URLs*

lang.type: Valid BCP 47 language tag or the empty string

loop.descriptionText: Whether to loop the media resource

method.descriptionText: Variant to use for form submission

muted.descriptionText: Whether to mute the media resource by default

name.descriptionText: Name of the element to use for form submission and in the form.elements API
Name of form to use in the document.forms API

name.type: Valid navigable target name or keyword

name.descriptionText: Name of image map to reference from the usemap attribute

nomodule.descriptionText: Prevents execution in user agents that support module scripts

nonce.descriptionText: Cryptographic nonce used in Content Security Policy checks [CSP]

novalidate.descriptionText: Bypass form control validation for form submission

open.descriptionText: Whether the dialog box is showing

pattern.descriptionText: Pattern to be matched by the form control's value
pattern.type: Regular expression matching the JavaScript Pattern production

ping.type: Set of space-separated tokens consisting of valid non-empty URLs

placeholder.descriptionText: User-visible label to be placed within the form control

playsinline.descriptionText: Encourage the user agent to display video content within the element's playback area

popover.descriptionText: Makes the element a popover element

popoverhidetarget.descriptionText: Hides the specified popover element when clicked
popoverhidetarget.type: ID of the element to hide

popovershowtarget.descriptionText: Shows the specified popover element when clicked
popovershowtarget.type: ID of the element to show

popovertoggletarget.descriptionText: Toggles the specified popover element when clicked
popovertoggletarget.type: ID of the element to toggle

poster.descriptionText: Poster frame to show prior to video playback
poster.type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

preload.descriptionText: Hints how much buffering the media resource will likely need

readonly.descriptionText: Whether to allow the value to be edited by the user
Affects willValidate, plus any behavior added by the custom element author

referrerpolicy.descriptionText: Referrer policy for fetches initiated by the element

rel.descriptionText: Relationship between the location in the document containing the hyperlink and the destination resource
rel.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens*

rel.descriptionText: Relationship between the document containing the hyperlink and the destination resource
rel.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens*

required.descriptionText: Whether the control is required for form submission

rows.type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

rowspan.descriptionText: Number of rows that the cell is to span

sandbox.type:
Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, ASCII case-insensitive, consisting of
      "allow-downloads""allow-forms""allow-modals""allow-orientation-lock""allow-pointer-lock""allow-popups""allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox""allow-presentation""allow-same-origin""allow-scripts""allow-top-navigation""allow-top-navigation-by-user-activation""allow-top-navigation-to-custom-protocols"

scope.descriptionText: Specifies which cells the header cell applies to

selected.descriptionText: Whether the option is selected by default

shape.descriptionText: The kind of shape to be created in an image map

size.type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

sizes.type: Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, ASCII case-insensitive, consisting of sizes*

sizes.descriptionText: Image sizes for different page layouts

span.descriptionText: Number of columns spanned by the element
span.type: Valid non-negative integer greater than zero

spellcheck.descriptionText: Whether the element is to have its spelling and grammar checked

src.type: Valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces

srcdoc.descriptionText: A document to render in the iframe
srcdoc.type: The source of an iframe srcdoc document*

srcset.descriptionText: Images to use in different situations, e.g., high-resolution displays, small monitors, etc.
srcset.type: Comma-separated list of image candidate strings

step.descriptionText: Granularity to be matched by the form control's value
step.type: Valid floating-point number greater than zero, or "any"

tabindex.descriptionText:
Whether the element is focusable and sequentially focusable, and
     the relative order of the element for the purposes of sequential focus navigation

target.type: Valid navigable target name or keyword

target.descriptionText: Default navigable for hyperlink navigation and form submission
target.type: Valid navigable target name or keyword
Valid navigable target name or keyword

title.descriptionText: Full term or expansion of abbreviation
Description of pattern (when used with pattern attribute)

translate.descriptionText: Whether the element is to be translated when the page is localized

type.descriptionText: Hint for the type of the referenced resource

type.type: "module"; a valid MIME type string that is not a JavaScript MIME type essence match

usemap.descriptionText: Name of image map to use

value.descriptionText: Value to be used for form submission
Ordinal value of the list item

wrap.descriptionText: How the value of the form control is to be wrapped for form submission
